  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public static void setUp()

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_JustY

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_JustY() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Using a 1x1 Puzzle Grid, which is just grass, checks if the fact it expects a tent on the y-axis is caught.

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_WithTent

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_WithTent() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Using a 1x1 Puzzle Grid, which is just a tent, checks if the fact it expects 2 tents on the y-axis is caught. (This is an impossible situation given the constraints, but for the purposes of the test it is fine)

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_DoubleBad

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_DoubleBad() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Using a 1x1 Puzzle Grid, which is just grass, checks if the fact it expects a tent on both x and y is caught.

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_2x2ColumnOnly

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_2x2ColumnOnly() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Looks at a 2x2 Board in the format: [] Tr [] Gr Column 2 is checked to have 1 Tent (which is not present, thus producing a contradiction)

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_2x2RowOnly

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_2x2RowOnly() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Looks at a 2x2 Board in the format: Tr Gr [] [] Row 1 is checked to have 1 Tent (which is not present, thus producing a contradiction)

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_3x3OneColumn

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_3x3OneColumn() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Looks at a 3x3 Board in the format: [] Tr [] [] Gr [] [] Gr [] Column 2 is checked to have 1 Tent (which is not present, thus producing a contradiction)

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_3x3TwoColumn

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_3x3TwoColumn() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Looks at a 3x3 Board in the format: Gr Tr Gr Gr [] Gr Gr Tr Gr Column 1 and 3 are checked to have 1 Tent (which is not present, thus producing a contradiction)

    • TooFewTentsContradictionRule_NoContradiction

      public void TooFewTentsContradictionRule_NoContradiction() throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - Looks at a 2x2 Board in the format: Tn [] Tr [] This should fail the contradiction as it is a legal board.
